data.message: Is there anyway possible you all can try and do something about all of these fake profiles that are being set up.I know myself and many others that are getting many many friend request from people we have never heard of and I know they can not be real profiles.It has become very annoying and a little scary to be truthful.I have had 12 just this morning!!!!!!

replies.message: Hey Tonya. Fake accounts are not allowed on Facebook. Have you tried following these steps to report fake accounts? Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1PTVdrt. Thanks for helping keep Facebook a safe place! -Jordan
Yes I have I got a response back that the accounts were breaking no rules!
Same here, I have to report them about a dozen times before the profile is removed. The other reports conclude the fake profiles aren't breaking rules.
It is getting ridiculous. I have gotten about 30 since I made this post.
